channel.title: AncientBlitz | Nex | Completionist Cape | Loads of fun
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://"http://ancientblitz.com"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XMnNu.png[/img][/URL]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img][url=http://www.AncientBlitz.com]Home Page[/url] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][url=http://www.ancientblitz.com/index.php]Forums[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img][url=http://www.AncientBlitz.com/webclient.php]Play Now[/url]
[size=24pt]Features[/size] [center]Awesome PvP Great Switching No DC's - very stable Mem usage fixed (Client mem leak fixed - creds to arrowzflame) Fullscreen in webclient WITH NO FUCKING LAG Quick prayers and curses 100% client sided saving ect User & pass saves World switching (1 is regular world and 2 is developers wich is set to localhost) Custom minigames such as new fightcaves for new rs firecape Barbarian assault Most skills 100% like rs such as firemaking, woodcutting ,mining, cooking ect. All skills All special weapons All PvP Armour Tons of Bosses Great training area's Skilling Zone Helpful community 24/7 Server Great website Friendly staff Mysql Pooling Hyperions Game Engine, event system and task system. Flax spinning Redid fishing 2 100% Agility courses. Gnome & Barbarian Bones on altar is automatic 2 random events. The sandwhich lady and genie random. Public construction. Storing items in a BoB. Fixed every dupe I can find. Reduced memory usage in client. 8 different crowns. Loyalty titles to chatbox and in front of names. Donators have 3 different crown options. Gambling box which you have a random chance at a rare item.
Construction Skill! [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/542/constructionp.gif/][IMG]http://img542.imageshack.us/img542/4072/constructionp.gif[/img][/URL]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fdrVt.png[/img]
Bank PIN's to keep your account safe! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PZgbj.png[/img]
Many Skill's with many features! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9Vk2g.png[/img]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/59/35650043.png/][IMG]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/6718/35650043.png[/img][/URL]
Absolutely Amazing PK'ing! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LAul7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Pbsjv.png[/img]
Overload's! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dONBV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Muw2K.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/P5QE6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/E2SRY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/op7bG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Zu0It.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mfdz7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TGsoW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wKUxn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sIKFA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eYC8Y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IHwPs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/r1908.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZuZ5s.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xG2lD.png[/img][/center]

item.title: AncientBlitz | Nex | Completionist Cape | Loads of fun
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

No offense, but looks a lot like any other server out there… :S I guess it’s a lot of core features… But I hear Hyperion Game Engine and shit isn’t good in a PI (from Loveandpower and people like him). Just a suggestion, maybe you should take pics of things you have that aren’t in every other server, such as: Gambling Box, Random Events, Crowns, Some of the specs that you think no one really has or are overlooked and some of the bosses that no other server has. Anyway, I wish you luck!

Read full topic
